name: Beards of the World
description:
The competition takes place every two years, and hirsute men from all over the world come together to compete over who has the biggest, weirdest or most handsome beard or moustache.

All the bearded men are taken from Nick's photographs. In this print he wanted to show all the different national costumes people came in - as well as the amazing beards of course!



Title: Beards of the World

Medium: Linocut + Screenprint on 100% cotton rag archival buff-coloured etching paper

Paper Size: 56cm x 56cm
Print Size: 46cm x 46cm

Edition of 20

Signed and Numbered by the Artist

‚Äú‚Ä¶For their Pick Me Up Debut B.O.T.S are taking their imagery back to school to create an alphabet print series that looks at illustrated type and create images that display our childhood memories. Expect toys, visual stories, and prints galore!‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äî at Somerset House

name: One More Step
description:
Title: One More Step

Medium: Printed on 250gsm Tintoretta Gesso 

Size: 420 x 297mm

Year: 2012

This set of 3 illustrations were created for the first 'Brothers of the Stripe' exhibition - High Rides & Low Tides. 

The story of Giant Bird & Little Bunny - 'Tori Atama to Usagi Chan' - a short adventure at sea. The water barely covers Giant Bird's ankles, as he wades through the sea with his head in the clouds. Little bunny plays and sleeps - carefree in the protect on her giant friend...

name: Canvas Pouch - Good Times
description:
The 'Let the good times roll' design has been printed in a patchy letterpress style in black on heavy natural canvas with a black cotton lining. Perfect for big nights out!

Our canvas pouches make a fantastic anytime clutch and are perfect for carrying your handbag essentials. These versatile pouches are also great for storing makeup and are terribly useful when travelling. 

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip. 

Made in the UK

Heavy natural canvas

Screen printed in black

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

280mm by 200mm (11 by 8 inches)

name: Canvas Pouch - Hello
description:
Say hello to everyone you know when out and about with this terrific clutch. The design has been printed in green on heavy natural canvas with a black cotton lining.

Our canvas pouches make a fantastic anytime clutch and are perfect for carrying your handbag essentials. These versatile pouches are also great for storing makeup and are terribly useful when travelling. 

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip. 

Made in the UK

Heavy natural canvas

Screen printed in green

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

280mm by 200mm (11 by 8 inches)

name: Canvas Pouch - Smile
description:
In the words of Anne, "you're never fully dressed without a smile" so be sure to complete your outfit with this super clutch. Printed in pink on heavy natural canvas with a black cotton lining.

Our canvas pouches make a fantastic anytime clutch and are perfect for carrying your handbag essentials. These versatile pouches are also great for storing makeup and are terribly useful when travelling. 

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip. 

Made in the UK

Heavy natural canvas

Screen printed in pink

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

280mm by 200mm (11 by 8 inches)

name: Little Canvas Pouch - Treasure
description:
Keep your treasures safe and sound in this sweet little pouch. The hand-lettered design has been screen printed in teal ink on a soft natural canvas pouch.

Our little canvas pouches are terribly handy, perfect for storing all sorts of bits and bobs, from make up to money and all other handbag essentials. They also make a rather lovely pencil case!

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip.

Made in the UK

Soft natural canvas

Screen printed in teal

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

195mm by 120mm (7¬æ by 4¬æ inches)

name: Little Canvas Pouch - Glitter Heart
description:
Spread the love with this terrific glitter heart pouch! The sweet heart has been printed with hot pink glitter on a soft natural canvas pouch.

Our little canvas pouches are terribly handy, perfect for storing all sorts of bits and bobs, from make up to money and all other handbag essentials. They also make a rather lovely pencil case!

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip.

Made in the UK

Soft natural canvas

Screen printed in hot pink glitter

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

195mm by 120mm (7¬æ by 4¬æ inches)

name: Little Canvas Pouch - Ace
description:
Being organised is ace and you can be super organised with this bold little pouch! The Ace design has been screen printed in steel blue ink on a soft natural canvas pouch.

Our little canvas pouches are terribly handy, perfect for storing all sorts of bits and bobs, from make up to money and all other handbag essentials. They also make a rather lovely pencil case!

Lovingly stitched and printed in the UK, complete with a heavy-duty gold colour zip.

Made in the UK

Soft natural canvas

Screen printed in steel blue

Black cotton lining and sturdy zip

195mm by 120mm (7¬æ by 4¬æ inches)

name: Skull Profile in Crown Jubilee Teacup and Saucer
description:
Enjoy a regal cup of tea from this bone china teacup and saucer set with the Skull design and gold detail.

Beautiful and quirky, this bone china teacup and saucer with the 'Skull Profile in Crown' design is part of the Melody Rose London Inspired collection.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day. Looks wonderful with the Skull in Crown Teapot but pieces can be bought individually, as sets, or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts.

Made from:

Bone china teacup and saucer. Made in England in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated, gilded by hand and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London studios.

Teacup dimensions: W8.5 x H8cm. 
Saucer dimensions: 14cm.
Made in England

name: Skull in Red Crown Teacup and Saucer
description:
Enjoy a regal cup of tea from this bone china Skull in Red Crown teacup and saucer set.

Beautiful and quirky, this bone china teacup and saucer with the 'Skull in Red Crown' design is part of the Melody Rose London Inspired collection.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day. Looks wonderful with the Skull in Crown Teapot but pieces can be bought individually, as sets, or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts.

Made from:

Bone china teacup and saucer. Made in England in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated, gilded by hand and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London studios.

Perfect for use everyday though washing by hand will help prevent gold trim fading over time.

Teacup dimensions: W8.5 x H8cm.
Saucer dimensions: 14cm. 
Made in England

name: Skull in Red Crown Bone China Plate
description:
The Skull in Red Crown bone china plate, available in three sizes, from the new Melody Rose tableware range. A small and affordable piece of art, gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Beautiful and quirky, the 'Skull in Red Crown' plate is part of the Melody Rose London Inspired collection. The perfect plate to use for a supper, lunchtime sandwich or dessert. Makes a make quirky and wonderful gift.


Side/Dessert plate dimensions 17.5cm

Buy on it's own or select from sizes and designs to mix and match and create a unique set.

Made from:

Bone china plate. Made in England in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated, gilded by hand and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London studios.

name: Skull In Crown Jubilee Teapot
description:
Enjoy a regal cup of tea from this beautiful and quirky bone china teapot.

Bone china teapot with gold detail and the 'Skull in Crown' design is part of the Melody Rose London Inspired 2012 collection.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Pieces can be bought individually, as sets, or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts. Looks wonderful with the Skull in Crown teacup and saucer and the Skull in Crown cake plate.

Made from:

Bone china.  Made in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated and gilded by hand at the Melody Rose London Studios.

Perfect for use everyday though washing by hand will help prevent gold trim fading over time.

Dimensions = H 18cm x W 22 cm x D 10cm 
Made in England 6 cup teapot

name: The Models Bone China Plate
description:
The Models bone china plate, available in three sizes, a small and affordable piece of art from the new Melody Rose tableware range, gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Beautiful and quirky, the 'Models' plate is part of the Melody Rose Modern SurRealist collection. Inspired by a love of surrealism, infused with a modern twist, these designs are fun, eccentric and beautiful.

The perfect plate to use for a romantic supper, lunchtime sandwich or dessert. Makes a wonderful gift or wedding present.

Choose from three sizes:

Dinner plate dimensions 27cm 
Salad plate dimensions 22.5cm 
Side/Dessert plate dimensions 17.5cm

Buy on it's own or select from sizes and designs to mix and match and create a unique set.

Made from:

Bone china plate. Made in England in Stoke-on-Trent, gilded by hand, then decorated and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London studios. These are hand made pieces, design may vary slightly from piece to piece.

name: The Models Bone China Teacup and Saucer
description:
The 'Models' teacup and saucer, from the Melody Rose tableware collection. A small and affordable piece of art is gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Beautiful and quirky, The 'Models' design teacup and saucer is part of the Modern SurRealist collection. Inspired by a love of surrealism, infused with a modern twist, these designs are fun, eccentric and beautiful.

The perfect teacup for any occassion. Makes a wonderful gift or wedding present.

Looks wonderful with the Models Cake Plate and Coffee pot but Melody Rose pieces can be bought individually or mixed and matched and make quirky and wonderful gifts.

Made from:

Bone china. Teacup and saucer made in Stoke-on-Trent, England. Gilded by hand, then design, decorated and fired in the kiln at the Melody Rose London Studios.

Can be used everyday but washing by hand is recommended to prevent original gold trim fading over time.

Teacup dimensions = H6cm x W10cm 
Saucer dimensions = W14cm

name: Models and Gold Coffee Pot
description:
Set the scene using this beautiful and quirky bone china teapot with the 'Models' design. Part of the Melody Rose Modern SurRealist collection, inspired by a love of surrealism, infused with a modern twist.

Birds fly across the top of the pot on one side and a gold drip slips down the lid on the other.

Bone china coffee pot made in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated and gilded by hand at the Melody Rose London Studios.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day. Melody Rose pieces can be bought individually, as sets, or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts.

Perfect for use everyday though washing by hand will help prevent gold detail fading over time.

Bone China Coffee Pot with Gold detail on lid 
Dimensions = H 24.5cm x W 21 cm x D 13cm

name: Kissing Couple Bone China Plate
description:
The Kissing Couple plate, a small and affordable piece of art, gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Beautiful and quirky, the 'Kissing Couple' plate is part of the Melody Rose Modern SurRealist collection. Inspired by a love of surrealism, infused with a modern twist, these designs are fun, eccentric and beautiful.

The perfect plate to use for a special occasion or a lunchtime sandwich. Makes a wonderful gift or wedding present.

 
Side/Dessert plate dimensions 17.5cm

Buy on it's own or select from sizes and designs to mix and match and create a unique set.

Made from:

Bone china plate. Made in Stoke-on-Trent, England. Gilded by hand, then decorated and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London studios.

name: Dragonfly Teacup and Saucer
description:
one china teacup and saucer with the 'Dragonfly' design with gold handle, part of the Melody Rose Urban Nature Collection.

Beautiful and quirky, the 'Dragonfly' teacup is perfect for using any time of day.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional.

Looks great as a set with the Dragonfly teapot, but Melody Rose pieces can be bought individually or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts.

This teacup and saucer is made by hand and design may vary slightly from piece to piece.  Teacup and saucer sold together as a set.

Made from:

Bone china. Teacup and saucer made in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated, gilded by hand and kiln fired at the Melody Rose London Studios.

Can be used everyday but washing by hand is recommended for pieces with gold details.

Teacup dimensions: W10 cm x H6 cm 
Saucer dimensions: 14cm

name: Dragonfly and Gold Teapot
description:
Set the scene for your next tea party using this beautiful and quirky bone china teapot with the 'Dragonflies' design. Part of the Melody Rose Urban Nature collection, for nature loving city and country dwellers.

Bone china teapot made in Stoke-on-Trent, then decorated and gilded by hand at the Melody Rose London Studios.

Dimensions = H 18cm x W 22 cm x D 10cm

name: Upcycled Bird Design Vintage Teacup and Saucer
description:
Beautiful and quirky, this upcycled vintage bone china tea cup and saucer with the 'Bird and Nest' design is part of the Melody Rose Urban Nature collection. Perfect for nature-loving city and country dwellers, this line includes butterflies, eagles, birds and bees.

This small and affordable piece of art is gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Redesigned using my own ceramic decals, this piece has been re-fired in the kiln at over 800 degrees and is made to last. Please note however, that this is a vintage bone china piece so hand washing helps prevent gold trim fading over time.

name: Upcycled skull design side plate
description:
Upcycled vintage gold bone china side plate with the 'Skull' design, part of the Melody Rose Rock and Roll collection.

Beautiful and quirky, enjoy a decadent slice of cake from this upcycled Melody Rose side plate.

Gorgeous displayed, but also entirely functional and can be used every day.

Looks great as a set with the gold Skull design teacup and saucer, but pieces can be bought individually or mixed and matched and make wonderful gifts.

The gold side plate is available in both round and square shape.

Made from:

Upcycled vintage bone china. Can be used every day but washing by hand will help prevent original gold details fading over time.

name: Bird Lady Screen Print
description:
Wonderful three colour screen print in Yellow, Brown and Blue. 

This print was hand screen printed at Rob Ryan's East London Studio. It is a small edition of only 69 prints!

Title: Bird Lady

Medium: 3 colour screen print

Paper size :50cm  by 71.cm 
Print size   : 27.1cm by 40.2cm 
Frame : 74cm x 53cm

Edition size of 69

Signed and numbered by Rob.

name: We Don't Fly North
description:
Hand printed two colour print in blue and black which reads "We don't fly north. We don't fly south. We Stay put right here. 365 Days a year. Year in - year out. The people next door and the floor below and the building next door and the building next door to that. The whole street and the next street and the next street until it seems as if every building in the entire city seemed to join onto its neighbour to make just one vast single building with only a series of walls between you and every other person in the city. Once we were just neighbours now we are friends. We never travelled very far but we went the distance."

Edition of 92

Measurement: Print: 71cm x 53 cm with Black Frame

name: You Are My Universe
description:
Lovely two colour screenprint in warm Vanilla and Jade Green which reads:

'You are my universe. Moons circle planets and planets circle stars, stars and galaxies rotate eternally and you and I circle each other for you are my universe entirely and i will always be yours.'

Paper size is 50cm wide by 71cm high

Print size is 46cm wide by 41cm high (Approx)

Frame size  is 53cm x 72cm

The edition size is 100 

All prints are signed and numbered by Rob.

name: Keep Calm Tea Towel - Red
description:
The 'Keep Calm and Carry On' design has been reproduced from a British World War Two poster. The design has been screen printed in red onto a lovely soft cotton tea towel, perfect for keeping calm in the kitchen! 

The original poster was produced upon the outbreak of World War 2 as a means of allaying public fear. The poster was held in reserve for use only in times of extreme crisis. Although thousands were produced, only a handful ever saw the light of day.

Even today 'Keep Calm and Carry On' is a phrase which perfectly encapsulates the traditional British 'stiff upper lip!

Soft white cotton tea towel

Screen printed in red

With hanging loop

700mm by 480mm (27¬Ω by 19 in)

name: Wine Tea Towel
description:
Wine Tea Towel from Keep Calm Gallery designed by The Lepolas.

A meal without wine is like a day without sunshine'. 

This design has been screen printed in wine bottle green ink onto a lovely soft cotton tea towel. We've packed the words using some of our favourite fonts into a wine bottle silhouette. 

This phrase was first written by Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, a 19th Century French gastronome who also wrote "A dessert without cheese is like a beautiful woman with only one eye", but we didn't think this would make such a nice tea towel! 

A great gift for wine lovers!

Organic natural cotton
Screen printed in green
With hanging loop

name: Bear In the Forest Card
description:
Watercolour illustration of a Bear in the forest by artist Daniel Mackie printed on High quality 330gsm card.

Cards are 148mm x 104mm.

Cards are blank inside so can be used for any purpose, such as Thank-you cards , birthdays or Christmas.

Bear in his forest, part of a collection of illustrations about animals in their natural habitat. There is constant pressure on resources and the losers are always the creatures who's habitat we humans encroach upon

Cards comes with envelopes and are protected in a cello bags.

name: Girl with the Frog Umbrella Card
description:
Watercolour illustration of a Girl in the Rain with a frog umbrella by Daniel Mackie. Printed on High quality 330gsm card.

Cards are 7x5 inches.

Cards are blank inside so can be used for any purpose, such as Thank-you cards , birthdays or Christmas.

Cards comes with envelopes and are protected in a cello bags.

name: Great Owl Card
description:
Watercolour illustration of a Great Grey Owl by Daniel Mackie. Printed on High quality 330gsm card. 

Cards are 7x5 inches.

Cards are blank inside so can be used for any purpose, such as Thank-you cards , birthdays or Christmas.

Cards comes with envelopes and are protected in a cello bags.

Part of a series of cards highlighting habitat loss. In the case of the Great Grey Owl its deforestation due to logging.

This species of owl lives in the northern hemisphere, from North America to northern Asia, they breed in the coniferous forests in the high northern latitudes, between the tundra, and the temperate forest.

The Great Grey Owl is listed Endangered under California‚Äôs Endangered Species Act.

name: Whale Card

name: Forest Tea Party Cake Stand
description:
Forest Tea Party Cake Stand from Mellor Ware collection, created by Lianne Mellor.

This range is about a Great Tit discovering the joys of a good cup of tea - he lands on the cup, has a little sip and then feels all rejuvenated and ready to go!

A beautiful 3-tier cake stand, perfect for displaying your afternoon tea!

It arrives flat packed as 3 individual plates with a lovely metal handle made in Birmingham!

The Mellor Ware tea party set is a contemporary alternative to Granny‚Äôs ‚Äúbest‚Äù teaware. It‚Äôs a modern day heirloom to be collected, treasured but most importantly used everyday!

All items are fine bone china and dishwasher microwave safe. They are decorated by hand in Sheffield using decals of Mellor's watercolour illustration.

The hand finish nature of the pieces means that there might be differences between the individual items, which adds the uniqueness and charm of the collection.

Dimensions: H 35cm bottom plate-27.5cm middle plate-22cm top plate 16cm

name: Birdie Eating Cake Tea Cup And Saucer
description:
Birdie Eating Cake tea cup and saucer from Mellor Ware, created by Lianne Mellor.

This range is inspired by a cheeky little Blue Tit who used to visit my garden, this one finds a cherry bun and can‚Äôt resist a peck!

Brilliantly sized for a ‚Äòproper‚Äô cup of tea to really get you going in the mornings! The curvaceous shape feels wonderful to hold, and helps your hot drink to cool off. Not a tea lover? not to worry, this teacup is also perfect for cappuccinos and hot chocolates leaving plenty of room for frothy milk, whipped cream and marshmallows!

All items are fine bone china and dishwasher microwave safe. They are decorated by hand in Sheffield using decals of Mellor's watercolour illustration.

The hand finish nature of the pieces means that there might be differences between the individual items, which adds the uniqueness and charm of the collection.

Dimensions: Cup - H.7 x W.11 x D.13.5 (including handle) Saucer - H.2 x W.16.5 x D.16.5cm

Complete the whole tea set to enjoy tea party experience.

description:

name: Badger Squirrel Mouse Teacup and saucer
description:
Badger squirrel mouse tea cup and saucer from Mellor Ware collection, created by Lianne Mellor.

This range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

It‚Äôs almost as if they‚Äôve been watching us have all the fun, and are now joining in in their own way! I wonder what they‚Äôll get up to next! This design depicts a mole decorating cakes with cherries, while the hedgehog helps him by holding the cherries!

All items are fine bone china and dishwasher microwave safe. They are decorated by hand in Sheffield using decals of Mellor's watercolour illustration.

The hand finish nature of the pieces means that there might be differences between the individual items, which adds the uniqueness and charm of the collection.

Dimensions: Cup - H.7 x W.11 x D.13.5 (including handle) Saucer - H.2 x W.16.5 x D.16.5cm

Complete the whole tea set experience.

This range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

All items are fine bone china and dishwasher microwave safe. They are decorated by hand in Sheffield using decals of Mellor's watercolour illustration.

A generously sized 6-cup teapot, perfect for pouring (no drips) and really brightens up your kitchen. Why not treat the tea lover in your life?

The hand finish nature of the pieces means that there might be differences between the individual items, which adds the uniqueness and charm of the collection.

Mole Hedgehog Cherries Suger Bowl from Mellor Ware collection, created by Lianne Mellor.

This range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

It‚Äôs almost as if they‚Äôve been watching us have all the fun, and are now joining in in their own way! I wonder what they‚Äôll get up to next! This design depicts a mole decorating cakes with cherries, while the hedgehog helps him by holding the cherries!
All items are fine bone china and dishwasher microwave safe. They are decorated by hand in Sheffield using decals of Mellor's watercolour illustration.

The hand finish nature of the pieces means that there might be differences between the individual items, which adds the uniqueness and charm of the collection.

Dimensions: H.11 x W.11 x D.11cm

his range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

name: Mama Bear
description:
Paul Roden + Valerie Lueth

Piled high with fuzzy cubs, this roaring "MAMA BEAR" bounds across a field of mossy green, about to smash down into a powerful stance upon rings of lacy, milky blue lichens. No trial or trouble is too fierce in her pursuit to protect her roly poly brood. "MAMA BEAR" is a 20" x 16" standard size woodcut printed from 4 hand-drawn, hand-carved woodblocks.


20" x 16" 

Woodcut Print on Natural Japanese Kitakata Paper

EDITION OF 200 PRINTS.

Signed and numbered by the artists.

2012

name: Big bad, Bad Wolf
description:
Paul Roden + Valerie Lueth


"BIG, BAD WOLF" is a playful image of a wolf marching through a soft grey thicket of fading rose blossoms. In tale, the cunning wolf is often a lurking menace. "BIG, BAD WOLF" idealizes the wolf comically smashing a path through a castle shaped patch of thorny stalks. "BIG BAD WOLF" is printed from 2 woodblocks (one is jigsawed) with a red to pink rainbow gradient from top to bottom. 

16" x 20.5" 

Woodcut Print on Natural Japanese Kitakata Paper

2ND EDITION OF 100.

2011

name: Garden
description:
Paul Roden + Valerie Lueth


A grassy wilderness rings the golden mound where this "GARDEN" grows. A tabby cat peers at a rabbit munching on a sprouting bush; a snake slithers through grass blades. The "GARDEN" presents an age-old scene, a testament to our ability to provide for ourselves, nudging nature to our benefit. Tools and baskets, a pump and a bucket, and an assortment of small decorative flourishes (a golden wind bell, a hollow gourd birdhouse, dangling ornaments) lend a human touch to the artful arrangement of foliage in this 5 block color woodcut print.

Print: 18" x 24" 
Frame : 19" x 25"

Color Woodcut Print on Ivory Somerset Paper

EDITION OF 200.

Signed and numbered by the artists.

2011

2012

name: Bonefire
description:
"BONFIRE" presents an idyllic nature-scape with ancient people joined together around the collective warmth of a blazing firepit at sunset. Lush greens, reds, oranges, and blues provide a rich backdrop for this vibrant dusk gathering. 

"BONFIRE" reminds of a time when the struggle for survival alongside the elements was a prevailing predicament. 

"BONFIRE" debuted at the MANIFEST EQUALITY art exhibition in L.A. in March, 2010.

Image Size: 16" x 24"/Paper Size: 18" x 26.25" 

Color Woodcut Print on Ivory Somerset Paper. 

EDITION OF 100 PRINTS. 

Signed and number by the artist.
